enchantment.extra-damage-enchantments.bu: Increase damage and inflicts slowness against animals and monsters such as Hoglins and Striders.
enchantment.extra-damage-enchantments.he: Increases damage against floral and fungal mobs such as creepers.
enchantment.extra-damage-enchantments.re: Increases damage against humanoid mobs such as Piglins and Villagers.
enchantment.extra-damage-enchantments.un: Increases damage and inflicts glow against magic-based mobs such as Blazes and Vexes.
enchantment.extra-damage-enchantments.vo: Increases damage and inflicts glow against void-related mobs such as Endermen and Shulkers.
gamerule.damageEnchantAgainstPlayerEffec: PvP effectiveness of extra damage enchantments
Bonus damage from extra damage enchantments (such as Rebel) will be multiplied by this value if the target is a player.
